statements: UPDATE ShoppingLists SET dietary_restriction='Vegetarian' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE ShoppingLists SET meal_name='Pasta Salad' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE ShoppingLists SET dietary_restriction='Vegetarian' WHERE meal_name='Breakfast' AND id=1;
UPDATE ShoppingLists SET meal_name='Lunch', dietary_restriction='Gluten-Free' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE MealPlan SET meal_name = 'Breakfast', meal_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE meal_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE ShoppingList SET list_name = 'Weekly Grocery', list_date = '2023-01-20', list_items = '{"item1": "Milk", "item2": "Bread", "item3": "Eggs"}' WHERE list_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE MealPlan SET meal_name = 'Breakfast', meal_date = '2022-09-05' WHERE meal_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ShoppingList SET list_date = '2022-09-10', list_items = '{"items": ["Apples", "Bananas", "Milk"]}' WHERE list_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE meal_plans SET dietary_restrictions='Vegetarian', meal_name='Breakfast' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE shopping_lists SET items='Milk, Bread, Eggs', total_price=25.50 WHERE id=3;
UPDATE meal_plans SET ingredients = 'Tomato, Onion, Bell Pepper' WHERE meal_name = 'Vegetable Stir Fry';
UPDATE shopping_lists SET total_price = 35.99, items = 'Eggs, Milk, Bread' WHERE date = '2022-05-20';
UPDATE meal_plans SET meal_description = 'New Description' WHERE meal_id = 1;
UPDATE shopping_lists SET list_items = '{"item1": 5, "item2": 10}' WHERE list_id = 2;
UPDATE meal_plans SET meal_name = 'Healthy Breakfast', meal_description = 'A nutritious meal to start your day' WHERE meal_id = 1;
UPDATE shopping_lists SET list_items = '{"items": ["Vegetables", "Fruits", "Protein"]}' WHERE list_id = 2;
UPDATE MealPlans SET meal_name='Healthy Dinner' WHERE meal_id=1;
UPDATE ShoppingLists SET list_complete=true WHERE list_id=3;
UPDATE MealPlans SET meal_name='Healthy Meal Plan', meal_description='A plan for nutritious meals', meal_date='2023-01-15' WHERE meal_id=1;
UPDATE Meals SET meal_type='Snack', meal_category='Healthy', meal_name='Fruit Snack' WHERE meal_id=3;
